short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Apply a Microsoft Word-like smooth caret animation to multiple online editors

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Apply a Microsoft Word-like smooth caret animation to multiple online editors.

Currently supported websites:

* Google Docs (https://docs.google.com/)
* Overleaf (https://www.overleaf.com/)

Head over to GitHub to request new websites: https://github.com/ewen-lbh/smooth-cursorify
